customFiles.html:
<select (change)="changeChartData($event)">
  @for ( data of dataConfigs; track data; let index = $index) {
    <option [value]="index">{{ data?.title }}</option>
  }
</select>
<luzmo-viz-item
  type="line-chart"
  [authKey]="authKey"
  [authToken]="authToken"
  [slots]="slots"
  [options]="options"
  style="max-width:800px; height:400px;"
></luzmo-viz-item>
